notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: All the authors discussed and planned the paper; I.J., I.F., A.-M.C., K.B., S.B. and L.Č. drafted the manuscript; I.J. performed HS-SPME, HD and analysis of VOCs by GC-FID/MS; I.F. performed GC-FID analysis of fatty acids; A.-M.C. performed the extractions and fractionation by SPE and determination of the pigment profile by HPLC; K.B. performed antimicrobial testing; S.B. and L.Č. performed antioxidant scavenging ability determination; I.J., S.J. and R.Č.-R. reviewed and edited the manuscript; funding acquisition was obtained by I.J., S.J. and R.Č.-R. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
